snippet.title: Bravehood - The PvPvE Dungeoncrawler Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi fellow players,

We are happy to announce our new game Bravehood is going to be released in September. Bravehood is a PvPvE dungeoncrawler game. Fight, level up and loot with your team to banish enemies. Use relics and weapon arts to defeat enemies. Loot chests and kill mini-bosses for gathering new swords and armor.

To support us wishlist now on Steam! bit.ly/bravehood
Join our discord channel : bit.ly/bravehooddc

#games #indiegame #darkanddarker
